name: City Youth NOW!
description: The organization was established to provide enrichment and enhancements in the lives of children under the jurisdiction of the Juvenile Court. The early mission was to be the place of “last resort” serving the unique needs of system-involved children by providing funding for meaningful services not covered by government or other public entities.
